t: Leading RTD tea brands in the U.S. 2024 | Statista
s: Arizona was the top-selling ready-to-drink (RTD) tea brand in the United States in 2024, by a healthy margin. Sales of the beverage exceeded one billion dollars, compared to competitors PureLeaf and Lipton who had respective sales of 976 million and 601 million dollars.

t: Unilever ready to share Lipton RTD brand name as tea sale confirmed - Just Drinks
s: July 23, 2020 - Unilever has admitted it will need to come up with an agreement over the Lipton name after the company decided to sell the tea brand yet retain its Lipton iced tea joint-venture with PepsiCo.

t: Lipton - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Lipton is a brand named after its founder, Sir Tom Lipton, who started an eponymous grocery retail business in the United Kingdom in 1871. The brand was used for various consumer goods sold in Lipton stores, including tea from 1890 for which the brand is now best known.

t: Lipton Immune Support Launches as Functional RTD Tea Beverage Category Grows | World Tea News
s: May 25, 2022 - Lipton Immune Support is an RTD iced tea that’s a blend of green tea, Vitamin C and Zinc, and it’s available as a permanent line item at national retailers in Green Tea Pineapple Mango flavor in 12-packs and 64-ounce bottles, and Diet Green Tea Pineapple Mango flavor in 12-packs.

t: PepsiCo Adds RTD With Introduction of Lipton Hard Iced Tea
s: October 5, 2022 - Lipton will be entering the RTD market with Lipton Hard Iced Tea launching in early to mid-2023. The tea brand will be partnering with brewer FIFCO USA.
